name: snap2health

scripts.dev:stable: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc' node clean-standalone-server.js
scripts.dev:ultra-stable: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc' node clean-standalone-server.js & node scripts/memory-monitor.js --auto
scripts.dev:light: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048 --expose-gc' node lightweight-server.js
scripts.dev:ultra-light: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1536 --expose-gc --max-semi-space-size=16' node lightweight-server.js
scripts.dev:minimal: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1024 --expose-gc --max-semi-space-size=8 --optimize-for-size' node lightweight-server.js
scripts.start:stable: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next && npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc' node clean-standalone-server.js
scripts.start:ultra-stable: node scripts/kill-ports-improved.js --force && rm -rf .next && npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096 --expose-gc' node clean-standalone-server.js & node scripts/memory-monitor.js --auto
scripts.vercel-build: VERCEL=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_DEPLOYMENT=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' next build || (echo 'Build failed - running emergency fixes' && VERCEL=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_DEPLOYMENT=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' node scripts/fix-all-issues.js && VERCEL=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_DEPLOYMENT=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' next build --no-lint)
scripts.fix-ports-vercel: echo 'Skipping port check in Vercel environment'

description: > A Next.js app that lets users snap a meal photo (or type a description) and instantly receive a research‑backed nutritional breakdown plus goal‑specific suggestions powered by GPT-4o.
